message:
The cigarette announcements have become the talk of the day among Gazans on social networks.

Everyone wants nicotine. It's a sensitive spot...

Poor Abu Khader from Deir al-Balakh - there they didn't drop any...

Lebanese channels report casualties in an Israeli UAV attack on a motorcycle in the village of Taybeh in southern Lebanon a short time ago.

According to unofficial sources there are two dead in this attack.

The spokesman of the Iranian Revolutionary Guards congratulates himself and his comrades:

The fear of the Iranian reaction to the elimination of Haniyeh took over the Zionist entity and its settlers.

High demand for the cigarette announcements that the IDF threw over the Mawasi area in Khan Yunis

Gazans report that the IDF dropped flyers on Mawasi in Khan Yunis that read:
"Smoking is dangerous, but Hamas is more"
"Hamas is burning Gaza"
as well as a cigarette and a contact phone number "for those who want more..."

A prominent Gazan wrote online that the number of calls received by the number published by the IDF on the announcement was enormous.
The callers from Gaza asked when cigarette flyers will be dropped in the north of the Gaza Strip and when in Deir al-Balah in the center of the Gaza Strip...

IDF: Following the initial report regarding the shooting attack in the area of the Mehola Junction on Route 90, terrorists opened fire from a passing vehicle at a number of vehicles in the area. As a result of the attack, an Israeli civilian was killed, and an additional Israeli civilian was injured and is currently receiving treatment from medical teams. IDF soldiers have begun pursuing the terrorists, blocking routes, and conducting thorough searches in the area.
Sources identified with the Shia axis: 6 dead and 15 wounded from among the Shia militias in the UAV attack on the vehicle in al Bukamal in eastern Syria.

"Who will replace Sinwar?"

A good question (with 1.2 million views) asked yesterday by an Algerian journalist, who lives in Europe and works against the Iranian axis.

#the_day_after_sinwar

Statements attributed to Israel's Minister Katz according to which the residents of the Jenin refugee camp should be treated the same as the residents of Gaza, including evacuating them from the camp, are being quoted widely in Arab media.
Palestinian sources report that a robbery took place today at the only bank branch open in the center of the Strip and in the south - "Bank of Palestine".

Channels affiliated with the Shia axis report an attack carried out a short time ago by an unidentified drone on a vehicle in the al Bukamal area in eastern Syria.

According to some sources there are 4 dead as a result of the attack.
This is an area where mostly American aircraft operate, but there have been cases in the past of attacks attributed to Israel in this area.
Islamic Jihad: Totally deny the claims of the occupation army spokesman regarding the presence of our military operatives inside the "A-Taba'een" school in Gaza City.

Unofficial Syrian sources identified with the Shiite axis report that an Iranian cargo plane of the Ilyushin 76 type landed in the last few hours at the Hmeimim airport in Syria.
This airport was effectively expropriated by Russia from Assad's hands and is under full Russian control. It is unlikely that Israel will attack this field.

Iran: The new Pezeshkian government

Today the Iranian president-elect announced the ministers to be appointed in his government.
Disappointment was registered among those who expected the government to bear a reformist character, as expected by those who elected the president who "represents" the reformist trend in Iran.
The government is "a Khamenei government" in which all the ministers were dictated from above and most of them are conservative.
Citizens from Arab regions of Iran pointed out that they have no representation in the government - there are no ministers of Arab origin.
Moving backwards...

Internally displaced Gazans are complaining about their fate due to the evacuation instructions they receive from Israel.

According to UNRWA, 75 thousand Gazans have been evacuated in the last few days.

Palestinian channels are publishing a satellite image from two days ago of the Hamad neighborhood which the IDF spokesman instructed to evacuate this morning.
In the photo you can see the layout of the displaced persons' tents in the compound before the evacuation. The buildings are also mostly inhabited..

According to Palestinian estimations, this is the evacuation of thousands of families.

The area of ​​buildings A8 and A7 in the Hamad neighborhood in Khan Yunis - an area that was attacked this morning after an IDF spokesman in Arabic called the residents of the Hamad neighborhood to evacuate to the west.
The evacuation continues.
The sons of Ismail Haniyeh, who survived and inherited their father's empire of billions, arrived full of smiles to visit the President of Turkey.
Algeria asked to convene the UN Security Council next Tuesday for an urgent discussion on the "massacre in the Daraj neighborhood in Gaza" (the "A-Taba'een" school).

Gazans began to evacuate the Hamad neighborhood in northern Khan Yunis following the IDF spokesman's announcement and the attacks in the area.
Palestinian journalists report injuries as a result of the attacks in the Hamad neighborhood this morning.

IDF: IDF operational activities continue across the Gaza Strip

IDF troops are continuing to conduct precise, intelligence-based operations in the Rafah area. This morning (Sunday), IDF troops identified a terrorist cell exiting a tunnel shaft in the area of Rafah. The IAF struck and eliminated the terrorists.

Iran has issued a NOTAM message about a flight ban over the area of ​​the Iranian air base "Nuja" located near the city of Madan in western Iran.
The flight ban, at an altitude of ten thousand feet, will apply from August 11 to August 14 from eight in the morning to six in the evening, according to Iran time. According to the announcement, shooting will take place in this area.

(Iranian time is half an hour ahead of Israeli time).
The attacks in the Hamad neighborhood (the area that received an evacuation alert this morning), in the north of Khan Yunis

Trump's campaign team:
Microsoft has informed us that one of the campaign's many websites has been hacked by the Iranian government. They were only able to access public information.
Iran will not stop because we have a weak government... not for much longer.
This morning the Palestinians are reporting attacks in the Hamad neighborhood in northern Khan Yunis - this will surely help speed up those who are delayed...
Hamad neighborhood in northern Khan Yunis before the war.

This morning, the IDF spokesman published another evacuation notice in Arabic announcing the "adjustment of the humanitarian space" - in fact the part of the Hamad neighborhood, which was built with Qatari funding, was removed from the humanitarian area of ​​Khan Yunis and the residents are now required to evacuate.

The IDF explains in both evacuation announcements that it was rocket fire from these areas that led to the evacuation.

Last night, shortly before midnight, the IDF spokesman issued an evacuation notice in Arabic for those staying in the Sheik Nasser, Barbakh and Ma'an neighborhoods in the center of Khan Yunis, in the south of the Gaza Strip.

Following the evacuation alert, many Gazans in the center of Khan Yunis began to move west during the night.
